Subject: Intermittent disabling of policy
Description: We have observed that during implementation, the polcies are losing control of clients intermittently thereby allowing access to blocked application and websites which are potential exit points. We have observed that whatsapp is unblocked for few seconds and then it blocks again after a while. P.S. server version is 5.9.4.0 but it does not give option to choose it in the server version list.
What_We_Know__c:
DPI did not apply to websited due to item in the allowlists.
We removed those items and DPI applies correctly.
----------
The customer confirmed that on the logs they blocked the app correctly but they were not able to block the what's app web website in the browser.
-------
The policy did not apply at first, it then applied after some modification. Then it stoped working again.
In the logs we noticed the policy did not load correctly.
In one instance we noticed the computer was removed from the policy without our imput.
---------
Whatsapp was blocked correctly from the CAP policy.
The customer now mentions non business gmail account can login to the browser.
Next_Steps__c:
Customer requested a week to test and get back to us.
------------
Customer will test the settings we made and revert to us.
------
Asking the customer to set the DPI setting in a specific way.
-----------
Waiting for customer to send the new logs from this issue.
----------
Server updated to 5.9.4.1. Policy is working.
Customer is to update the Epp client and confirm if he can login to non business google accounts.
